name: obsidian-calendar-wrapper-plugin
description: Wraps https://fullcalendar.io for use in dataview JS blocks

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.update-plugin-files: d=$(cat .plugin-dest-dir 2>/dev/null || echo './dist') && npm run build && mkdir -p ${d} && cp -f manifest.json main.js ${d}
